thread.title: Great experience!
thread.title_full: Great experience! - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Monica R
title: Great experience!
text: The service was excellent! The front desk was very helpful at giving directions to my symposium, restaurants, etc. They let me check in early, helped me with the computer, and had a car scheduled for me to get back to the airport. I felt very safe. Loved having the coffee and breakfast included. The room was very spacious, comfortable, quiet, and clean. Loved the neighborhood!
